name: AdhaiHighOrbitConstructions
description: You start with 43 M€. Effect: Whenever you play a card with a space tag but no planetary tag (including this) add 1 orbital on this card. For every 2 orbitals, cards with space tag but no planetary tag, the standard colony project, or trade action costs 1 M€ less.

name: AdvancedPowerGrid
description: Increase your energy production 2 steps. Increase your M€ production 1 step per power tag you have, including this.

name: AgroDrones
description: Requires -18° C or warmer. | Spend 1 steel and 1 energy to gain 3 plants.

name: Ambient
description: You start with 38 M€. As your first action, raise the Venus scale 2 steps. Effect: When you play a card with a Venus tag (including this) increase your heat production 1 step. Action: When temperature is maxed, spend 8 heat to gain 1 TR. You may repeat this action like a standard project.

name: Anthozoa
description: Requires 3 oceans on Mars. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card. | Spend 1 plant to add an animal to this card.

name: AsteroidResources
description: Spend 3 energy. Either increase your steel and titanium production one step, OR

name: Aurorai
description: You start with 33 M€ and 2 data on this card. Effect: Whenever you increase your terraform rating, add 1 data per step to any card. You can use data on this card as 3 M€ each to pay for standard projects.

name: BioSol
description: You start with 42 M€. As your first action, draw 2 cards with a microbe tag. Action: Add 1 microbe to any card. 1 VP per 3 microbes on this card.

name: BotanicalExperience
description: Requires one greenery tile on Mars.

name: BreedingFarms
description: Requires 1 science tag and 1 animal tag. Raise the temperature 1 step. | Spend 1 plant to add 1 animal to ANY card.

name: CassiniStation
description: Increase your energy production 1 step for every colony in play.

name: CeresSpaceport
description: Increase your M€ production 2 steps, and titanium production 1 step for every 2 Jovian tags (including these.)

name: CharityDonation
description: Reveal cards from the deck equal to the player count plus 1. In player order starting with you, each player takes one card in hand. Discard the remaining card. 1 VP.

name: Chimera
description: You start with 36 M€, 1 steel, and 1 titanium. Effect: When you perform an action, these 2 wild tags count as any tags of your choice. For claiming milestones and funding awards, both symbols count as one.

name: CO2Reducers
description: Increase your M€ production 3 steps. Draw 2 cards with a microbe tag.

name: CollegiumCopernicus
description: You start with 33 M€. As your first action, draw 2 cards with a science tag. Effect: When you play a card with a science tag (including this) add 1 data to any card. Action: Spend 3 data from this card to trade.

name: CommunicationCenter
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step. Place 2 data on this card.

name: ControlledBloom
description: Requires 3 oceans. Add 3 microbes to ANY card. Gain 3 plants.

name: CoordinatedRaid
description: Requires at least 1 colony in play. Send one of your unused Trade Fleets to ANY colony tile (can be a tile already used this generation.) | Requires at least 1 colony in play. Send one of your unused Trade Fleets to any colony tile.

name: Crashlanding
description: Place and orient the Crashlanding tile on a non-reserved space adjacent to no more than 1 city. Crashsite grants an adjacency bonus of 1 data, and either 1 steel or 1 titanium. When placing, for each tile you own next to it, gain those bonuses. Add 1 data to any card. Add 1 resource to any card.

name: CrewTraining
description: Choose a planet tag. This card counts as having 2 of that tag.

name: Cryptocurrency
description: Spend 1 energy to add 1 data to this card. | Remove all data from this card to gain 3M€ per data removed.

name: CultivationOfVenus
description: 1 VP for every 2 Venus tags you own. | Spend 3 plants to raise Venus 1 step.

name: Cyanobacteria
description: Raise the oxygen level 1%. For every ocean tile, add a microbe to ANY card.

name: DataLeak
description: Add 5 data to ANY card.

name: DeclarationOfIndependence
description: Requires that you have at least 6 Mars tags in play. Place 2 delegates in any party.

name: DeepSpaceOperations
description: Gain 4 titanium. Draw 2 event cards with a space tag.

name: DesignCompany
description: Increase your steel production 1 step. Draw 3 cards with a building tag.

name: DesignedOrganisms
description: Requires 5 science tags. Increase your plant production 2 steps. Gain 3 plants.

name: DustStorm
description: Every player loses all energy. Raise the temperature 2 steps.

name: DysonScreens
description: Raise the temperature 1 step. Draw a card. Place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA. Raise your energy and heat production 2 steps. | Pay 2 titanium to raise your heat and energy production 1 step each.

name: EarlyExpedition
description: Temperature must be -18 C or lower. Decrease your energy production 1 step and

name: EconomicEspionage
description: Spend 2 M€ to Add 1 data to ANY card.

name: EconomicHelp
description: Raise the lowest non-completed planetary influence track 3 steps. When tied, raise all lowest tracks 2 steps.

name: ExpeditionToTheSurfaceVenus
description: Draw 2 cards. Raise Venus 1 step. Gain 1M€ for each of your Venus tags, including this.

name: ExperiencedMartians
description: Place 1 delegate in any party. Draw 2 cards with a Mars tag. Increase your M€ production 2 steps.

name: FlatMarsTheory
description: Requires maximum 1 science tag. Increase your M€ production 1 step for every generation played so far.

name: FloaterUrbanism
description: Requires 4 Venus tags. | Spend 1 floater from any card to add 1 Venusian habitat on this card.

name: GagarinMobileBase
description: You start with 42 M€. As your first action, put Gagarin Mobile Base on any area on Mars. Collect the bonus. Action: Move the Base to any nearest empty area where it has not yet been. Collect the bonus. Effect: When another player places a tile where the Base is, move the Base.

name: GeologicalExpedition
description: When you place a tile ON MARS gain 1 additional resource on the space. If the space has no bonus, gain 1 steel.

name: HabitatMarte
description: You start with 40 M€. Effect: Mars tags also count as science tags.

name: HighTempSuperconductors
description: Requires Kelvinists are ruling or you have 2 delegates there. Increase your energy production 2 steps. | When playing a power card, THE STANDARD PROJECT POWER PLANT, OR THE KELVINIST RULING POLICY ACTION, pay 3M€ less.

name: HuygensObservatory
description: Place a colony. MAY BE PLACED ON A COLONY TILE WHERE YOU ALREADY HAVE A COLONY.

name: HydrogenBombardment
description: Increase the Venus scale 1 step. Increase your titanium production 1 step. Gain 6 M€.

name: HydrogenProcessingPlant
description: Oxygen level must be 3% or higher. Decrease oxygen level 1%

name: InterplanetaryTransport
description: Increase your M€ production 1 step for every offworld city tile.

name: Kickstarter
description: Choose a planet tag. This card counts as having 1 of that tag. Raise the corresponding planetary track 3 steps in total.

name: LastResortIngenuity
description: The next card you play this generation can be paid for with steel or titanium despite its tags.

name: LobbyHalls
description: Increase your M€ production 2 steps. Place 1 delegate in any party.

name: LunarEmbassy
description: Increase your M€ production 3 steps, and plant production 1 step for every 2 Earth tags (including this.)

name: LuxuryEstate
description: Oxygen must be 7% or greater. Gain 1 titanium for each city tile and greenery tile you own.

name: MarsDirect
description: You start with 52 M€. Effect: When you play a Mars tag, you pay 1 M€ less for each Mars tag you have.

name: MarsMaths
description: You start with 40 M€. As your first action, draw 2 cards. Effect: At the beginning of the Research phase, you draw 5 cards, but may still only buy 4 cards. If you are drafting, keep 2 cards for your first draft. Action: Take another two actions this turn.

name: MartianCulture
description: Requires ANY 2 Mars tags in play.  1 VP for every 2 data here. | Add 1 data to ANY card.

name: MartianDustProcessingPlant
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step, and raise your steel production 2 steps. Gain 1 TR.

name: MartianInsuranceGroup
description: You start with 42 M€ and 1 M€ production. Effect: Whenever you play an event card, raise your M€ production 1 step.

name: MartianMonuments
description: Requires that you own a city ON MARS. Raise your M€ production 1 step for every Mars tag you own (including this.)

name: MartianNatureWonders
description: Place a neutral player cube on a non-reserved space. No tile can be placed on that space this game.

name: MartianRepository
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step. 1 VP for every 3 data here. | For every science or Mars tag you play (including these) add 1 data to this card.

name: MicrobiologyPatents
description: After you play a card with a microbe tag, increase your M€ production 1 step.

name: MindSetMars
description: You start with 44 M€ and 1 agenda resource on this card. Effect: When you play a card with a building tag, add 1 agenda on this card. Action: Spend 2 agenda resources to place 1 delegate in any party. Action: Spend 5 agenda resources to place a city tile on Mars.

name: MuseumofEarlyColonisation
description: Requires 1 ocean, 1 city and one greenery on Mars.

name: NewVenice
description: Requires 3 ocean tiles. Lose 2 plants. Increase your energy production 1 step and your M€ production 2 steps.

name: NobelLabs
description: Requires 4 science tags. | Add 2 microbes OR 2 data OR 2 floaters to ANY card.

name: Odyssey
description: You start with 33 M€. Effect: Your event cards stay face up, and their tags are in use as if those were automated (green) cards. Action: Pay for and play an event card you have already played that has a base cost of 16 M€ or less, after which discard that card.

name: OrbitalLaboratories
description: Increase your plant production 2 steps. Gain 1 plant.

name: OumuamuaTypeObjectSurvey
description: Requires 1 space tag and 1 science tag. Add 2 data to ANY card.

name: OzoneGenerators
description: Requires 6% Oxygen. | Spend 3 energy to gain 1 TR.

name: PersonalAgenda
description: Increase your M€ production 3 steps. Draw 3 event cards that do not have a space tag.

name: Polaris
description: You start with 32 M€. As your first action, place an ocean tile. Effect: When any ocean tile is placed on Mars, increase your M€ production 1 step. When you place an ocean tile, gain 4 M€.

name: Pollinators
description: Requires 3 plant tags. Raise your plant production 1 step and your M€ production 2 steps. | Add 1 animal on this card

name: PowerPlant
description: Increase your heat production 2 steps and your energy production 1 step.

name: PrefabricationofHumanHabitats
description: Requires that you have steel production. | Cards with a city tag cost 2M€ less. | The CITY STANDARD PROJECT costs 2M€ less. STEEL MAY BE USED as if you were playing a building card.

name: PrivateSecurity
description: Opponents may not remove your basic resource production.

name: PublicSponsoredGrant
description: Requires Scientists are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. All players lose 2M€. Choose a tag (NOT CITY, ? OR PLANETARY TRACK) and draw 2 cards with that tag.

name: RareEarthElements
description: Increase your M€ production by 1 for every special tile you own on Mars.

name: RedCity
description: Requires that Reds are ruling or that you have 2 delegates there.

name: ResearchGrant
description: Increase your energy production 1 step. Gain 14 M€.

name: ReturntoAbandonedTechnology
description: Draw the top 4 cards from the discard pile. Choose 2 to keep and discard the rest.

name: RichDeposits
description: Requires 2 science tags. Increase your steel production 3 steps.

name: Ringcom
description: You start with 39 M€ and 3 M€ production. As your first action, draw 2 cards with a Jovian tag. Effect: When any player plays a card with a Jovian tag (including this) gain 1 titanium.

name: RobinHaulings
description: You start with 39 M€. Effect: Whenever you play a card with a Venus tag add 1 floater to any card. Action: Remove 3 floaters from this card to raise Venus 1 step or raise oxygen 1 step.

name: SecretLabs
description: Requires 1 science tag and 1 Jovian tag.

name: SmallComet
description: Every player loses 2 plants. Raise the temperature 1 step. Raise the oxygen 1 step.

name: SmallOpenPitMine
description: Increase your steel production 2 steps OR increase your titanium production 1 step.

name: SocialEvents
description: Gain 1 TR for every 2 Mars tags you have (including this one.)

name: SoilDetoxification
description: Requires that Greens are ruling or you have 2 delegates there. Increase your plant production 1 step | Using the STANDARD GREENERY ACTION costs 1 plant less.

name: Solarpedia
description: Requires 1 Venus, Earth, Mars, and Jovian Tag. Add 2 data to ANY card. 1 VP for every 6 data resources here. | Add 2 data to ANY card.

name: SolarStorm
description: Every player loses 2 plants. Remove up to 3 data from any player.

name: SolBank
description: You start with 40 M€. Effect: Whenever you spend M€ (or steel or titanium) add 1 data to this card. During the production phase convert each data from this card into 1 M€ each.

name: SoylentSeedlingSystems
description: You start with 38 M€ and 2 seeds on this card. Effect: When you place a greenery tile, add 1 seed resource to this card. Effect: When paying for a plant card, or the standard greenery project, seeds here may be used as 5 M€ each.

name: SpaceDebrisCleaningOperation
description: Requires any 4 space tags in play. Gain 3 titanium.

name: SpaceRelay
description: Increase your M€ production 1 step. | Whenever you play a card with a Jovian tag, including this, draw a card.

name: SpecializedSettlement
description: Decrease your energy production 1 step and increase your M€ production 3 steps.

name: Steelaris
description: You start with 42 M€. Effect: When any city or special tile is placed on Mars, gain 1 steel and 1 plant.

name: SurveyMission
description: Gain 5 steel. Land-claim three non-reserved spaces in a triangle shape. Gain all placement bonuses.

name: TerraformingControlStation
description: Raise your TR 2 steps. | When you play a Venus or Mars tag, pay 2 M€ less.

name: TerraformingRobots
description: Requires 4 science tags. | When you play a Mars tag, add 1 specialized robot on this card.

name: TheNewSpaceRace
description: REVEALED BEFORE ANY OTHER PRELUDE. You become starting player for the game. Choose and set a ruling policy for the first generation. Gain 12 M€.

name: ThinkTank
description: Spend 2 M€ to place 1 data on any card. | When playing a card, you can remove data from this card to

name: ValuableGases
description: Gain 10 M€. PLAY AN ACTIVE FLOATER CARD FROM HAND, IGNORING GLOBAL REQUIREMENTS, and add 5 floaters to it.

name: VeneraBase
description: Requires Unity is ruling or that you have 2 delegates there. Raise your M€ production 3 steps and place a city tile ON THE RESERVED AREA. | Add 1 floater to ANY Venus card

name: VenusFirst
description: Raise Venus 2 steps. Draw 2 Venus cards.

name: VitalColony
description: Place a colony. Receive the placement bonus twice.

name: Wetlands
description: Requires 2 ocean tiles. Lose 4 plants. Place Wetlands tile on an unreserved space adjacent to at least 2 oceans. Raise oxygen 1 step. Gain 1 TR. Wetlands counts as a greenery tile and an ocean tile, except it cannot be covered and is not one of the 9 oceans required to end the game. 1 VP.
